description:
remaining service  time of an item which has been gained either by a mathematical model using service-life-determining measured data gathered during operation of the item, or on the basis of a broad treasure trove of experience with measured data of good as well as of damaged items of the same type, resulting at a given data and time.
By comparing  the residual predicted operation times along planned time intervals, a tendency can be observed.

name.defaultValue: residual predicted  operation time of an item

i18nValue.en_US: residual predicted  operation time of an item
